mapper.sql: ID, P_ID, EQU_TYPE_ID, FIELD, TITLE, FORM_NAME, WIDTH, DISPLAY_TYPE, FIXED, SORT, COLSPAN, ROWSPAN, CLASS_NUM, PROPERTY_TYPE, IS_DISPLAY, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_SEARCH, SORT_NUM, STANDBY1, STANDBY2, STANDBY3
mapper.select:
select
from IOT_EQUIPMENT_DISPLAY_INFO where EQU_TYPE_ID = #{equTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_DISPLAY = 1 order by SORT_NUM

select
from IOT_EQUIPMENT_DISPLAY_INFO where EQU_TYPE_ID = #{equTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROPERTY_TYPE = 2 and COLSPAN = 1 order by SORT_NUM

from IOT_EQUIPMENT_DISPLAY_INFO where EQU_TYPE_ID = #{equTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COLSPAN = 1 and IS_SEARCH = 1 order by SORT_NUM
select max(CLASS_NUM) || '' as MAXCLASSNUM FROM IOT_EQUIPMENT_DISPLAY_INFO where EQU_TYPE_ID = #{equTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
